channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unemptied Hackney Street Bin, 23rd December
item.description:
The bin is overflowing at the junction of Myddleton Avenue and Heron Drive N4. It hasn't been emptied recently. Maybe the regular street cleaner is away?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Myddleton Avenue, Hackney, London

item.title: Dog Mess, 23rd December
item.description:
Location. In Pope House car park Manor Estate off Roseberry St SE16 Mess is in the Ambulance Parking area. Please clear. Thank You.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anchor Street, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Just past the yellow bar way gate to Blackbrook Lane car park, on right-hand side, in front of emergency access barway, 23rd December
item.description:
A large tree has partially shed a big branch. It is completely obstructing access to the emergency barway gate used regularly by the park ranger, contractors and potentially by the emergency services too. It needs dealing with urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbrook Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence has fallen over and blocks the pathway, 23rd December
item.description:
This has been like this for at least a year

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Way, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen leaves. ., 23rd December
item.description:
Every year I have to come on here and ask for the leaves to be cleared. Every year 1 side gets cleared and my side in front and the alley way never gets cleared. When opening my kitchen window and bathroom window all I can smell is damp, decaying leaves. Can someone please clear this. They have been here since Autumn when the leaves started to fall. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Burham Close, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress on April Street E8, 23rd December
item.description:
Hello, please can you remove the dumped mattress on April street E8 Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): April Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is NOT fixed! Fly tipping to rear of No 30/32 Heavitree Road, 23rd December
item.description:
This has been reported continuously over the past month and is now listed as fixed... it is NOT fixed - this continues to block access for emergency vehicles to properties - some of which are local authority owned and leased. Please fix this for our community so that the dumping of rubbish doesn't continue to grow!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heavitree Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on front wall of 12 Southend Road, 23rd December
item.description:
Some graffiti has appeared on the front white wall of 12 Southend Road. It has been there for a few weeks. Please can it be removed - thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle on private property, 23rd December
item.description:
This vehicle is parked without permission on private property. It has been left here for at least a month if not longer. The picture shows the damage to the front of the vehicle. We wish for it to be removed off our premises.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Slip, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Comms box south side close to junction of The Avenue and Southend Road has graffiti on its side, 23rd December
item.description:
The new grey comms box on the south side of The Avenue, very close to the junction with Southend Road, has some graffiti on the side of it nearest the junction. Please can it be removed - thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping outside Fareshares, 23rd December
item.description:
Please can you remove all of this flytipping? The bins are overflowing and Veolia will not collect all of the waste that has been dumped. This is a repeated issue and it needs to be fixed by installing more bicycle lockers around here or something to prevent the flytipping. Please tidy up asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Crampton Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect/misleading signage on Orchard Hill, 23rd December
item.description:
This sign says the road is unsuitable for motors, yet traffic still flows through and cars are parked on it. This sign should be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Hill, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resident dumping large amounts of domestic waste on pavement, 23rd December
item.description:
Resident continually dumping large amounts of domestic waste on pavement, blocking pedestrian access. Pedestrians have to walk in the road to get past, and as parking is permitted on the opposite pavement, this is unsafe. This is continuous behaviour, and is left out for days/weeks when no waste collection is scheduled

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Road, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
